Package org.flag4j.linalg.ops.dense.field_ops

package org.flag4j.linalg.ops.dense.field_ops

  • Class
    Description
    DenseFieldDeterminant
    This utility class contains methods for computing the determinant of a dense matrix whose entries are elements of a Field.
    DenseFieldElemDiv
    This class contains low-level implementations of element-wise tensor division between two field tensors.
    DenseFieldElemMult
    This class contains low-level implementations of complex element-wise tensor multiplication.
    DenseFieldEquals
    This class provides methods for checking the equality of dense tensors whose elements are members of a Field.
    DenseFieldHermitianTranspose
    Utility class for computing the Hermitian transpose of a dense field tensor.
    DenseFieldMatMultDispatcher
    Utility class which stores a map of all viable dense Field matrix multiply algorithms and uses that map to dispatch a dense Field matrix multiply problem to the appropriate algorithm.
    DenseFieldMatMultDispatcher.AlgorithmNames
    Simple enum class containing all possible choices of real dense matrix multiply algorithms.
    DenseFieldMatrixMultiplication
    This class contains several low-level methods for computing matrix-matrix multiplications between two Field matrices.
    DenseFieldMatrixMultTranspose
    This class contains several low level methods for computing matrix-matrix multiplications with a transpose for two dense Field matrices.
    DenseFieldOps
    This class provides low level methods for computing operations on dense field tensors.
    DenseFieldProperties
    This utility class contains methods useful for verifying properties of a FieldTensor.
    DenseFieldSetOperations
    This class contains low-level implementations of setting operations for dense field tensors.
    DenseFieldTensorDot
    This class contains methods for computing a tensor dot product, i.e.
    DenseFieldTranspose
    Utility class for computing the transpose of a dense field tensor.
    DenseFieldVectorOperations
    This class provides low level implementations for vector operations with two dense Field vectors.
